    Use ThriftFuture.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.thrift.ThriftFutures
    Use the static factory methods in ThriftFuture or ThriftListenableFuture.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.EventLoopThreadFactory
    Use ThreadFactories.newEventLoopThreadFactory(String, boolean) or ThreadFactories.builder(String). Note that setting ThreadFactoryBuilder.eventLoop(boolean) true is required to create event loop threads, e.g. ThreadFactories.builder("myThreadNamePrefix").eventLoop(true).build().
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.NativeLibraries
    Use Flags instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.auth.HttpAuthService
    Use AuthService.

    Use AuthService.builder().

    Use HealthCheckService.

    Use HealthCheckService.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.AccessLogWriters
    Use the factory methods in AccessLogWriter.

    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.BINARY. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_COMPACT
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.COMPACT. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.

    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.JSON. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.SerializationFormat.THRIFT_TEXT
    Use ThriftSerializationFormats.TEXT. Note that the value of this field will be null if armeria-thrift module is not loaded.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.zookeeper.NodeValueCodec.DEFAULT
    Use NodeValueCodec.ofDefault().

    com.linecorp.armeria.spring.MeterIdPrefixFunctionFactory.DEFAULT
    Use MeterIdPrefixFunctionFactory.ofDefault().

    Use ServerBuilder.requestTimeout(Duration).

    Use ServerBuilder.requestTimeoutMillis(long).

    Use ServerBuilder.gracefulShutdownTimeoutMillis(long, long).

    Use ServerBuilder.http(int) or ServerBuilder.https(int).
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.serviceAt​(String, HttpService)
    Use ServerBuilder.service(String, HttpService) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.tls​(SslContext)
    This method has been deprecated because an incorrectly built SslContext can cause a Server to malfunction. Use other tls() methods.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServerBuilder.withDefaultVirtualHost()
    Use ServerBuilder.defaultVirtualHost().
